document.full_text: about 37,000 north carolina residents lost their unemployment benefits on saturday when gov. beverly perdue refused to sign a budget bill that extended the benefits for those unemployed more than 99 weeks.
document.title: about 37,000 north carolina residents lose jobless benefits
lines_and_colors: about 37,000 north carolina residents lost their unemployment benefits on saturday when gov. beverly perdue refused to sign a budget bill that extended the benefits for those unemployed more than 99 weeks.
